description:
As a Destination Wedding Planner, your primary responsibility is to meticulously plan and execute weddings in unique and exotic locations, ensuring that every detail reflects the couple's vision and exceeds their expectations. This business opportunity requires exceptional organizational skills, creativity, and a keen eye for detail to orchestrate seamless and unforgettable experiences for couples and their guests.

Responsibilities

Client Consultation:

  • Meet with couples to understand their preferences, vision, and budget for their destination wedding
  • Provide expert guidance and recommendations based on the couple's preferences, theme, and party size

Logistics Management:

  • Coordinate travel arrangements, accommodations, transportation, and activities for the couple and their guests
  • Ensure smooth logistics throughout the entire wedding journey, from arrival to departure

Timeline & Itinerary Planning:

  • Develop detailed timelines and itineraries for the wedding weekend, outlining key events, activities, and transitions
  • Plan and schedule any activities the couple and their guests may want to enjoy while at the destination

Qualifications:

  • Knowledge of destination wedding trends, locations, and vendors
  • Proficiency in budget management and financial planning
  • Strong organizational skills and attention to detail
  • Excellent communication and negotiation skills
  • Creativity and ability to think outside the box to create unique and memorable experiences

Benefits & Perks:

  • Dedicated Website with booking tool
  • Training provided FREE
  • Travel Agent Liability Insurance provided
  • Work from anywhere with internet
  • Travel discounts

If this is you, I have the perfect business opportunity for you.

Join our team for this exciting new opportunity!

You must be 18 yrs of age & authorized to work in the US or reside in one of these countries:

Australia Dominican Republic

Bahamas Mexico

Costa Rica United Kingdom

Cayman Islands Aruba

Bahamas Panama

All other locations do not qualify for this Position
